text: Ricardo Almeida Ribeiro (born 9 May 1997) is a Portuguese footballer who plays for Berço SC on loan from Moreirense as a forward. ==Football career== On 23 May 2015, Almeida made his professional debut with Moreirense in a 2014–15 Primeira Liga match against Arouca. ==References== ==External links== * *Stats and profile at LPFP * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:Moreirense F.C. players Category:Sporting CP B players Category:Portugal youth international footballers
